archimate:Folder.name: Close Service Trouble Report
archimate:Folder.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Close a service trouble report when the service problem has been resolved Extended Description The objective of the Close Service Trouble Report processes is to close a service trouble report when the service problem has been resolved. These processes monitor the status of all open service trouble reports, and recognize that a service trouble report is ready to be closed when the status is changed to cleared. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use. Optional Reserved for future use. Interactions
